approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

update_mining_parameters.description: Updates mining parameters such as time, rate, and supply.

mintable_in_timeframe.description: Returns the amount mintable in a given timeframe.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining amount that a spender can spend from the owner's account.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to the specified address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens.

set_name.description: Sets the name and symbol of the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used for displaying token amounts.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a specified address.

minter.description: Returns the address of the current minter.

admin.description: Returns the address of the current admin.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.

UpdateMiningParameters.description: Emitted when mining parameters are updated.

SetMinter.description: Emitted when the minter address is set.

SetAdmin.description: Emitted when the admin address is set.
